body:
Hi, 
I  have been created this new PR following the discussion from old PR#26281 where there was conflicts. This time i started off from most recent IB available (CMSSW_10_6_X_2019-04-09-1100) and also made just one commit for all the changes.
title: Data relvals 2018 ABC,2016 and 2017 relvals using Offline GTs now by
